testcase.classname: Feature to test company carrer page functionality
testcase.name: XRAY-009 Verify that a maximum of 10 jobs are displayed initially, and clicking the Load More
testcase.system-out: Given I launch company career page..........................................passed And I click required type company career page...............................passed And I select "India" as a country in dropdown...............................passed When I click search button..................................................passed Then I verify mentioned no of jobs displayed...............................passed When I click load more buttton..............................................passed Then I verify mentioned no of jobs displayed...............................passed
